episode_event_academy_autumn_battle/8301:
Hmph! This is a big battle. I’m not
gonna lose!
episode_event_academy_autumn_battle/8302:
Well, then... Let’s give the audience what
they want, shall we?
episode_event_academy_autumn_battle/8304:
Why don’t you come sing and dance
with us?
episode_event_academy_autumn_battle/8305:
I, Grimsley, in my role as proctor, will be
your opponent today.

Put what you’ve learned up till now to
the test.

You’ve passed your midterm exam...but you
still have a long way to go!
episode_event_academy_autumn_battle/8306:
If this were a story, you could say this test
is the climax!

I, Shauntal, will be your opponent for the
final test!
Congratulations on a job well done!

You’ve written yourself a splendid
happy ending!
episode_event_academy_autumn_battle/8307:
Um... W-would you like to test what we
learned in class in a real battle?
episode_event_academy_autumn_battle/8308:
You wanted some advice about Pokémon
battles? All right, then! Let’s get fired up!
